author: kpedro88
body:
Suggested by @ianna to reduce CPU usage. I left the original logic of the most complicated form (`HcalTopology::validHcal(const HcalDetId& id, const unsigned int flag)`) in a block comment because it took me ~6 tries to come up with a single-line statement that matched the output of the original. The new version actually reduces the number of function calls, and I printed out every possible case in a simple C++ program to make sure the output is identical.

attn: @bsunanda
title: avoid some temporaries in HcalTopology
